title: PopulrChroomy WatchFace Bundle
summary: Collection of beautifully designed Watch Face with multiple features.
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37-A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Buy this bundle of watch faces and enhance your options to stylize and customize your smart wear. With three different watch faces you have option to choose the watch face with features that you like the most. Change backgrounds and features according to every event.FrillRoid Watch Faces focus in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:- 3 uniquely designed watch faces Analog Dials and digital dials Weather update Classic Design with Ultimate readability Clean and simplistic look Remaining battery life of your watch Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThese watch faces ares carefully designed for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear LiveVisit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.How it works?It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
Buy this bundle of watch faces and enhance your options to stylize and customize your smart wear. With three different watch faces you have option to choose the watch face with features that you like the most. Change backgrounds and features according to every event.

FrillRoid Watch Faces focus in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.

Key custom features:-

 3 uniquely designed watch faces
 Analog Dials and digital dials
 Weather update
 Classic Design with Ultimate readability
 Clean and simplistic look
 Remaining battery life of your watch
 Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge
 Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever
These watch faces ares carefully designed for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear Live
Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.

How it works?
It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
